mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as row_num,t.* from tb_cde_kbp t ) b where row_num=#{num}

select * from tb_cde_kbp t where 1=1
AND (KBP_CLASS = '${KBP_CLASS}' or KBP_CLASS like '${KBP_CLASS}-%')
AND KBP_CAPTION LIKE '%${KBP_CAPTION}%'
select * from (select length(t.KBP_CLASS) as l,t.* from TB_CDE_KBP t order by l desc ) t2 where rownum =1
select * from (select length(t.KBP_CAPTION) as l,t.* from TB_CDE_KBP t order by l desc ) t2 where l is not null and rownum =1

select KBP_CLASS from ( SELECT KBP_CLASS FROM ( SELECT t.KBP_CLASS, substr(t.KBP_CLASS, 0, INSTR(t.KBP_CLASS, '-', '1')) AS ts FROM TB_CDE_KBP t ) t2 WHERE t2.ts IS NULL ORDER BY t2.ts DESC ) GROUP BY KBP_CLASS
